attributes.action: All children should be given meningitis B vaccines on the NHS!
attributes.additional_details: Meningitis vaccines should be available to all children , every child's life is important !
attributes.background: Meningitis B takes children's lives , vaccines can prevent children from losing their lives but the vaccine is only offered on the NHS to children born after May 2015 , it can be paid for privately but many people cannot afford it , All children should be treated the same.
